mapper.select: SELECT MAX(esti_no) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT esti_no FROM user_estimate )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_estimate( user_id, esti_no, mater_no, mater_category, mater_name, mater_gas_kg, mater_img, mater_price, mater_durability, mater_info, mater_classify, kg_per_pyeong, esti_date, esti_title ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{estiNo}, #{materNo}, #{materCategory}, #{materName}, #{materGasKg}, #{materImg}, #{materPrice}, #{materDurability}, #{materInfo}, #{materClassify}, #{kgPerPyeong}, SYSDATE, #{estiTitle} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, esti_no, mater_no, mater_category, mater_name, mater_gas_kg, mater_img, mater_price, mater_durability, mater_info, mater_classify, kg_per_pyeong, esti_date, esti_title FROM user_estimate WHERE 1=1 AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY (esti_no) ASC
